title: Implement StarHTML server with SSE navigation
description: Create StarHTML application with Datastar signals for slide state. Implement SSE endpoints for next/prev/goto navigation. Add keyboard shortcuts via data_on_keydown__window.

title: Implement CLI with click
description: Create CLI entry point with 'stardeck run' command. Support --port, --host, --reload options. Display deck info on startup.

title: Add URL hash synchronization
description: Sync slide index with URL hash (#3 for slide 3). Support deep linking - reloading page preserves slide position.

title: Implement hot reload with watchfiles
description: Watch slides.md for changes using watchfiles. Trigger SSE update to refresh current slide without full page reload.

title: Implement overview mode (grid view)
description: Press Escape/O to toggle overview grid. Show thumbnails of all slides. Click thumbnail to navigate. Use Motion.dev for smooth zoom transition.

title: Implement presenter mode
description: Separate window for presenter screen. Show current slide, next slide preview, speaker notes, and elapsed timer. Sync with main window via signals.

title: Review: Task 2
close_reason: Reviewed: Clean SVG integration, well-documented JS module. SSE update issue noted for Task 6.

title: Review: Task 3
close_reason: Reviewed: Good edge case handling, proper Bezier smoothing. Note: Consider XML escaping for production hardening.
